column3: Setup: If you have not done so already, use the publisher_csv_upload testdrive to setup for this test at /testdrive/publisher_csv_upload
Log in as the publisher account specified by the testdrive result

Go to the 'Validate your Journal CSV' tab in the publisher dashboard

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com/publisher/journal-csv

column4: You are shown a message saying that you must select a file to upload

column3:
Click 'Choose File' and select a CSV file with valid data that will generate warnings

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/4009_csv_upload_conditional_fields/doajtest/doajtest/example_files/publisher_csv_upload_warnings.csv

column4: You are shown a validation message that says validation is successful with warnings
You are shown a list of warnings.  The following are the expected warnings
One of the headers is in the wrong case
One of the rows does not provide an update to the data

column3:
Click 'Choose File' and select a CSV file with valid data that will not generate any warnings

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/4009_csv_upload_conditional_fields/doajtest/doajtest/example_files/publisher_csv_upload_success.csv

column4: You are shown a validation message that says validation is successful

column3: If you are finished testing, you can teardown the testdrive using the link provided.  If you are going to continue with the other tests in this suite you can leave the testdrive in place until the very end
